vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Street Reconstruction Group 17-1104 (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Estrada Concrete Company, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of two - Not to exceed $3,132,382.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($2,194,055.50), Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($140,726.50), Water Construction Fund ($663,900.00), Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($127,700.00), and Wastewater Construction Fund ($6,000.00)
